meanings.sent1: The unprimed canvas awaited the artist's brush strokes.
meanings.sent2: The unprimed room lacked furniture or decorations.
meanings.sent3: The unprimed cake mix needed eggs and oil to be ready for baking.
meanings.sent4: Her unprimed mind was open to new ideas and possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The unprimed garden soil was waiting for seeds to be planted.

meanings.sent1: The unprimed wall absorbed the paint quickly.
meanings.sent2: The unprimed metal surface needed to be treated before painting.
meanings.sent3: The unprimed wood showed the natural grain and texture.
meanings.sent4: The unprimed canvas allowed the colors to blend in a unique way.
meanings.sent5: The unprimed paper soaked up the ink unevenly.

meanings.definition: Not influenced or biased by prior knowledge or experience
meanings.sent1: Her unprimed opinion was based solely on the facts presented.
meanings.sent2: The unprimed jury listened attentively to both sides of the case.
meanings.sent3: The unprimed student approached the subject with fresh eyes.
meanings.sent4: His unprimed perspective brought a new angle to the discussion.
meanings.sent5: The unprimed audience reacted honestly to the performance.
